title: ForgeMod怎么写
author: I_am_fudge
txt_content:
我按照教程弄好了，进到Eclipse里时提示我少了2个jar文件。请问怎么解决





1.png

replies.txt_content: 一般启动器会自动下载更新

replies.author: SilverMing
replies.txt_content:
請確保
C:\Users\Pwoer User\.gradle\caches\minecraft\net\minecraftforge\forge\(版本号)
裡有顯示沒有的文件

replies.author: 钻石荣耀
replies.txt_content: 好像要先配置forge 然后配置eclipse
